prompts.prompt_1:
Act as an HR expert and resume writer with a specialization in creating ATS-friendly resumes. Your task is to detail the work experience for a resume. For each job entry, ensure you include: 1. **Company Name and Location**: Provide the name of the company and its location. 2. **Job Title**: Clearly state your job title. 3. **Dates of Employment**: Include the start and end dates of your employment. 4. **Responsibilities and Achievements**: Describe your key responsibilities and notable achievements, emphasizing measurable results and specific contributions. - **My information:** [ExperienceDetails(position='Engineering Manager', company='Newton & Noble', employment_period='01/2024 - Present', location='Port Harcourt', industry='Software Development', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Oversee multiple development teams totaling 12 engineers, fostering a culture of innovation and continuous improvement across the organization'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Develop and implement company-wide technical strategies aligned with long-term business objectives, resulting in a 30% increase in overall product delivery speed'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Collaborate with C-level executives and product managers to define strategic product roadmaps and prioritize features based on market demands and company vision'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Implement and refine agile methodologies across teams, improving overall engineering efficiency by 25% and enhancing cross-team collaboration'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Establish and oversee mentorship programs and career development paths for engineers at all levels, resulting in improved retention and team satisfaction'}, {'responsibility_6': 'Manage resource allocation across projects and departments, optimizing team performance and project outcomes'}], skills_acquired=['Strategic Planning', 'Team Leadership', 'Agile Methodologies', 'Resource Management', 'Mentorship Program Development']), ExperienceDetails(position='Team Lead, Fullstack Development', company='Finway', employment_period='03/2023 - 12/2023', location='Munich', industry='Software Development', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Lead architectural decisions for enterprise-level, scalable software solutions, ensuring maintainability and performance across all projects'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Conducted regular performance evaluations and provided constructive feedback'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Recruited, interviewed, and hired new team members'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Facilitated clear and effective communication within the team to ensure alignment and collaboration'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Implemented and maintained agile methodologies, facilitating sprint planning, stand-ups, and retrospectives'}], skills_acquired=['Architectural Design', 'Performance Management', 'Agile Implementation', 'Team Communication', 'Talent Acquisition']), ExperienceDetails(position='Senior Software Engineer & Consultant', company='Foobar Agency', employment_period='06/2020 - 02/2023', location='Munich', industry='Software Consultancy', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Led the development of critical features for major commercial projects'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Drove product development by incorporating innovative ideas and prioritizing features to align with business goals'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Engaged with stakeholders to understand their requirements and translated them into technical specifications'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Mentored junior developers and encouraged best practices for accessible and maintainable code'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Employed advanced techniques including code splitting, lazy loading, and other optimization methods to enhance performance'}], skills_acquired=['Feature Development', 'Product Strategy', 'Stakeholder Management', 'Code Optimization', 'Technical Mentorship']), ExperienceDetails(position='Senior Fullstack Developer', company='Mosaic City Technologies', employment_period='02/2018 - 06/2020', location='Calabar', industry='Technology', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Took the lead in building several commercial and company projects from the ground up with a user-centered development process'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Involved in architectural design discussions for applications developed by other engineers'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Consulted with team members to determine system loads and develop improvement plans'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Encouraged and facilitated ongoing learning and development within the team'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Supported junior members and delivered training as required to boost team productivity'}], skills_acquired=['Project Leadership', 'Architectural Design', 'Performance Optimization', 'Team Development', 'Technical Training']), ExperienceDetails(position='Country Manager', company='Coscico Technologies', employment_period='10/2016 - 01/2018', location='Lagos', industry='Technology', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Established and maintained strong relationships with key stakeholders, including clients, partners, and government officials'}, {'responsibility_2': "Developed and executed comprehensive business strategies to increase the company's market share and drive revenue growth"}, {'responsibility_3': 'Led and managed cross-functional teams, including marketing, sales, and operations'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Implemented budgeting, forecasting, and financial planning in tandem with yearly goals'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Recruited, hired, and trained key staff members'}], skills_acquired=['Stakeholder Management', 'Business Strategy', 'Cross-functional Leadership', 'Financial Planning', 'Talent Management'])] - **Template to Use** ```

Work Experience

[Company Name] — [Location]
[Your Job Title] [Start Date] – [End Date]
  • [Describe your responsibilities and achievements in this role]
  • [Describe any key projects or technologies you worked with]
  • [Mention any notable accomplishments or results]
[Company Name] — [Location]
[Your Job Title] [Start Date] – [End Date]
  • [Describe your responsibilities and achievements in this role]
  • [Describe any key projects or technologies you worked with]
  • [Mention any notable accomplishments or results]
[Company Name] — [Location]
[Your Job Title] [Start Date] – [End Date]
  • [Describe your responsibilities and achievements in this role]
  • [Describe any key projects or technologies you worked with]
  • [Mention any notable accomplishments or results]
``` The results should be provided in html format, Provide only the html code for the resume, without any explanations or additional text and also without ```html ```

replies:
Work Experience

Newton & Noble — Port Harcourt
Engineering Manager 01/2024 – Present
  • Oversee multiple development teams totaling 12 engineers, fostering a culture of innovation and continuous improvement across the organization.
  • Develop and implement company-wide technical strategies aligned with long-term business objectives, resulting in a 30% increase in overall product delivery speed.
  • Collaborate with C-level executives and product managers to define strategic product roadmaps and prioritize features based on market demands and company vision.
Finway — Munich
Team Lead, Fullstack Development 03/2023 – 12/2023
  • Lead architectural decisions for enterprise-level, scalable software solutions, ensuring maintainability and performance across all projects.
  • Conducted regular performance evaluations and provided constructive feedback to team members.
  • Implemented and maintained agile methodologies, facilitating sprint planning, stand-ups, and retrospectives.
Foobar Agency — Munich
Senior Software Engineer & Consultant 06/2020 – 02/2023
  • Led the development of critical features for major commercial projects, driving product development by incorporating innovative ideas.
  • Engaged with stakeholders to understand their requirements and translated them into technical specifications.
  • Employed advanced techniques including code splitting and lazy loading to enhance performance.
Mosaic City Technologies — Calabar
Senior Fullstack Developer 02/2018 – 06/2020
  • Took the lead in building several commercial and company projects from the ground up with a user-centered development process.
  • Consulted with team members to determine system loads and develop improvement plans.
  • Supported junior members and delivered training as required to boost team productivity.
Coscico Technologies — Lagos
Country Manager 10/2016 – 01/2018
  • Established and maintained strong relationships with key stakeholders, including clients, partners, and government officials.
  • Developed and executed comprehensive business strategies to increase the company's market share and drive revenue growth.
  • Implemented budgeting, forecasting, and financial planning in tandem with yearly goals.

prompts.prompt_1:
Act as an HR expert and resume writer with a specialization in creating ATS-friendly resumes. Your task is to detail the work experience for a resume. For each job entry, ensure you include: 1. **Company Name and Location**: Provide the name of the company and its location. 2. **Job Title**: Clearly state your job title. 3. **Dates of Employment**: Include the start and end dates of your employment. 4. **Responsibilities and Achievements**: Describe your key responsibilities and notable achievements, emphasizing measurable results and specific contributions. - **My information:** [ExperienceDetails(position='Engineering Manager', company='Newton & Noble', employment_period='01/2024 - Present', location='Port Harcourt', industry='Software Development', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Oversee multiple development teams totaling 12 engineers, fostering a culture of innovation and continuous improvement across the organization'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Develop and implement company-wide technical strategies aligned with long-term business objectives, resulting in a 30% increase in overall product delivery speed'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Collaborate with C-level executives and product managers to define strategic product roadmaps and prioritize features based on market demands and company vision'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Implement and refine agile methodologies across teams, improving overall engineering efficiency by 25% and enhancing cross-team collaboration'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Establish and oversee mentorship programs and career development paths for engineers at all levels, resulting in improved retention and team satisfaction'}, {'responsibility_6': 'Manage resource allocation across projects and departments, optimizing team performance and project outcomes'}], skills_acquired=['Strategic Planning', 'Team Leadership', 'Agile Methodologies', 'Resource Management', 'Mentorship Program Development']), ExperienceDetails(position='Team Lead, Fullstack Development', company='Finway', employment_period='03/2023 - 12/2023', location='Munich', industry='Software Development', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Lead architectural decisions for enterprise-level, scalable software solutions, ensuring maintainability and performance across all projects'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Conducted regular performance evaluations and provided constructive feedback'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Recruited, interviewed, and hired new team members'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Facilitated clear and effective communication within the team to ensure alignment and collaboration'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Implemented and maintained agile methodologies, facilitating sprint planning, stand-ups, and retrospectives'}], skills_acquired=['Architectural Design', 'Performance Management', 'Agile Implementation', 'Team Communication', 'Talent Acquisition']), ExperienceDetails(position='Senior Software Engineer & Consultant', company='Foobar Agency', employment_period='06/2020 - 02/2023', location='Munich', industry='Software Consultancy', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Led the development of critical features for major commercial projects'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Drove product development by incorporating innovative ideas and prioritizing features to align with business goals'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Engaged with stakeholders to understand their requirements and translated them into technical specifications'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Mentored junior developers and encouraged best practices for accessible and maintainable code'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Employed advanced techniques including code splitting, lazy loading, and other optimization methods to enhance performance'}], skills_acquired=['Feature Development', 'Product Strategy', 'Stakeholder Management', 'Code Optimization', 'Technical Mentorship']), ExperienceDetails(position='Senior Fullstack Developer', company='Mosaic City Technologies', employment_period='02/2018 - 06/2020', location='Calabar', industry='Technology', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Took the lead in building several commercial and company projects from the ground up with a user-centered development process'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Involved in architectural design discussions for applications developed by other engineers'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Consulted with team members to determine system loads and develop improvement plans'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Encouraged and facilitated ongoing learning and development within the team'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Supported junior members and delivered training as required to boost team productivity'}], skills_acquired=['Project Leadership', 'Architectural Design', 'Performance Optimization', 'Team Development', 'Technical Training']), ExperienceDetails(position='Country Manager', company='Coscico Technologies', employment_period='10/2016 - 01/2018', location='Lagos', industry='Technology', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Established and maintained strong relationships with key stakeholders, including clients, partners, and government officials'}, {'responsibility_2': "Developed and executed comprehensive business strategies to increase the company's market share and drive revenue growth"}, {'responsibility_3': 'Led and managed cross-functional teams, including marketing, sales, and operations'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Implemented budgeting, forecasting, and financial planning in tandem with yearly goals'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Recruited, hired, and trained key staff members'}], skills_acquired=['Stakeholder Management', 'Business Strategy', 'Cross-functional Leadership', 'Financial Planning', 'Talent Management'])] - **Template to Use** ```

Work Experience

[Company Name] — [Location]
[Your Job Title] [Start Date] – [End Date]
  • [Describe your responsibilities and achievements in this role]
  • [Describe any key projects or technologies you worked with]
  • [Mention any notable accomplishments or results]
[Company Name] — [Location]
[Your Job Title] [Start Date] – [End Date]
  • [Describe your responsibilities and achievements in this role]
  • [Describe any key projects or technologies you worked with]
  • [Mention any notable accomplishments or results]
[Company Name] — [Location]
[Your Job Title] [Start Date] – [End Date]
  • [Describe your responsibilities and achievements in this role]
  • [Describe any key projects or technologies you worked with]
  • [Mention any notable accomplishments or results]
``` The results should be provided in html format, Provide only the html code for the resume, without any explanations or additional text and also without ```html ```

replies:
Work Experience

Newton & Noble — Port Harcourt
Engineering Manager 01/2024 – Present
  • Oversee multiple development teams totaling 12 engineers, fostering a culture of innovation and continuous improvement across the organization.
  • Develop and implement company-wide technical strategies aligned with long-term business objectives, resulting in a 30% increase in overall product delivery speed.
  • Collaborate with C-level executives and product managers to define strategic product roadmaps and prioritize features based on market demands and company vision.
Finway — Munich
Team Lead, Fullstack Development 03/2023 – 12/2023
  • Lead architectural decisions for enterprise-level, scalable software solutions, ensuring maintainability and performance across all projects.
  • Conducted regular performance evaluations and provided constructive feedback to enhance team productivity.
  • Implemented and maintained agile methodologies, facilitating sprint planning, stand-ups, and retrospectives.
Foobar Agency — Munich
Senior Software Engineer & Consultant 06/2020 – 02/2023
  • Led the development of critical features for major commercial projects, driving product development by incorporating innovative ideas.
  • Engaged with stakeholders to understand their requirements and translated them into technical specifications.
  • Mentored junior developers and encouraged best practices for accessible and maintainable code.
Mosaic City Technologies — Calabar
Senior Fullstack Developer 02/2018 – 06/2020
  • Took the lead in building several commercial and company projects from the ground up with a user-centered development process.
  • Involved in architectural design discussions for applications developed by other engineers.
  • Supported junior members and delivered training as required to boost team productivity.
Coscico Technologies — Lagos
Country Manager 10/2016 – 01/2018
  • Established and maintained strong relationships with key stakeholders, including clients, partners, and government officials.
  • Developed and executed comprehensive business strategies to increase the company's market share and drive revenue growth.
  • Led and managed cross-functional teams, including marketing, sales, and operations.

prompts.prompt_1:
Act as an HR expert and resume writer with a specialization in creating ATS-friendly resumes. Your task is to detail the work experience for a resume. For each job entry, ensure you include: 1. **Company Name and Location**: Provide the name of the company and its location. 2. **Job Title**: Clearly state your job title. 3. **Dates of Employment**: Include the start and end dates of your employment. 4. **Responsibilities and Achievements**: Describe your key responsibilities and notable achievements, emphasizing measurable results and specific contributions. - **My information:** [ExperienceDetails(position='Engineering Manager', company='Newton & Noble', employment_period='01/2024 - Present', location='Port Harcourt', industry='Software Development', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Oversee multiple development teams totaling 12 engineers, fostering a culture of innovation and continuous improvement across the organization'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Develop and implement company-wide technical strategies aligned with long-term business objectives, resulting in a 30% increase in overall product delivery speed'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Collaborate with C-level executives and product managers to define strategic product roadmaps and prioritize features based on market demands and company vision'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Implement and refine agile methodologies across teams, improving overall engineering efficiency by 25% and enhancing cross-team collaboration'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Establish and oversee mentorship programs and career development paths for engineers at all levels, resulting in improved retention and team satisfaction'}, {'responsibility_6': 'Manage resource allocation across projects and departments, optimizing team performance and project outcomes'}], skills_acquired=['Strategic Planning', 'Team Leadership', 'Agile Methodologies', 'Resource Management', 'Mentorship Program Development']), ExperienceDetails(position='Team Lead, Fullstack Development', company='Finway', employment_period='03/2023 - 12/2023', location='Munich', industry='Software Development', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Lead architectural decisions for enterprise-level, scalable software solutions, ensuring maintainability and performance across all projects'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Conducted regular performance evaluations and provided constructive feedback'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Recruited, interviewed, and hired new team members'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Facilitated clear and effective communication within the team to ensure alignment and collaboration'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Implemented and maintained agile methodologies, facilitating sprint planning, stand-ups, and retrospectives'}], skills_acquired=['Architectural Design', 'Performance Management', 'Agile Implementation', 'Team Communication', 'Talent Acquisition']), ExperienceDetails(position='Senior Software Engineer & Consultant', company='Foobar Agency', employment_period='06/2020 - 02/2023', location='Munich', industry='Software Consultancy', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Led the development of critical features for major commercial projects'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Drove product development by incorporating innovative ideas and prioritizing features to align with business goals'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Engaged with stakeholders to understand their requirements and translated them into technical specifications'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Mentored junior developers and encouraged best practices for accessible and maintainable code'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Employed advanced techniques including code splitting, lazy loading, and other optimization methods to enhance performance'}], skills_acquired=['Feature Development', 'Product Strategy', 'Stakeholder Management', 'Code Optimization', 'Technical Mentorship']), ExperienceDetails(position='Senior Fullstack Developer', company='Mosaic City Technologies', employment_period='02/2018 - 06/2020', location='Calabar', industry='Technology', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Took the lead in building several commercial and company projects from the ground up with a user-centered development process'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Involved in architectural design discussions for applications developed by other engineers'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Consulted with team members to determine system loads and develop improvement plans'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Encouraged and facilitated ongoing learning and development within the team'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Supported junior members and delivered training as required to boost team productivity'}], skills_acquired=['Project Leadership', 'Architectural Design', 'Performance Optimization', 'Team Development', 'Technical Training']), ExperienceDetails(position='Country Manager', company='Coscico Technologies', employment_period='10/2016 - 01/2018', location='Lagos', industry='Technology', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Established and maintained strong relationships with key stakeholders, including clients, partners, and government officials'}, {'responsibility_2': "Developed and executed comprehensive business strategies to increase the company's market share and drive revenue growth"}, {'responsibility_3': 'Led and managed cross-functional teams, including marketing, sales, and operations'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Implemented budgeting, forecasting, and financial planning in tandem with yearly goals'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Recruited, hired, and trained key staff members'}], skills_acquired=['Stakeholder Management', 'Business Strategy', 'Cross-functional Leadership', 'Financial Planning', 'Talent Management'])] - **Template to Use** ```

Work Experience

[Company Name] — [Location]
[Your Job Title] [Start Date] – [End Date]
  • [Describe your responsibilities and achievements in this role]
  • [Describe any key projects or technologies you worked with]
  • [Mention any notable accomplishments or results]
[Company Name] — [Location]
[Your Job Title] [Start Date] – [End Date]
  • [Describe your responsibilities and achievements in this role]
  • [Describe any key projects or technologies you worked with]
  • [Mention any notable accomplishments or results]
[Company Name] — [Location]
[Your Job Title] [Start Date] – [End Date]
  • [Describe your responsibilities and achievements in this role]
  • [Describe any key projects or technologies you worked with]
  • [Mention any notable accomplishments or results]
``` The results should be provided in html format, Provide only the html code for the resume, without any explanations or additional text and also without ```html ```

replies:
Work Experience

Newton & Noble — Port Harcourt
Engineering Manager 01/2024 – Present
  • Oversee multiple development teams totaling 12 engineers, fostering a culture of innovation and continuous improvement across the organization.
  • Develop and implement company-wide technical strategies aligned with long-term business objectives, resulting in a 30% increase in overall product delivery speed.
  • Collaborate with C-level executives and product managers to define strategic product roadmaps and prioritize features based on market demands and company vision.
Finway — Munich
Team Lead, Fullstack Development 03/2023 – 12/2023
  • Lead architectural decisions for enterprise-level, scalable software solutions, ensuring maintainability and performance across all projects.
  • Conducted regular performance evaluations and provided constructive feedback to team members.
  • Implemented and maintained agile methodologies, facilitating sprint planning, stand-ups, and retrospectives.
Foobar Agency — Munich
Senior Software Engineer & Consultant 06/2020 – 02/2023
  • Led the development of critical features for major commercial projects, driving product development by incorporating innovative ideas.
  • Engaged with stakeholders to understand their requirements and translated them into technical specifications.
  • Employed advanced techniques including code splitting and lazy loading to enhance performance.
Mosaic City Technologies — Calabar
Senior Fullstack Developer 02/2018 – 06/2020
  • Took the lead in building several commercial and company projects from the ground up with a user-centered development process.
  • Consulted with team members to determine system loads and develop improvement plans.
  • Supported junior members and delivered training as required to boost team productivity.
Coscico Technologies — Lagos
Country Manager 10/2016 – 01/2018
  • Established and maintained strong relationships with key stakeholders, including clients, partners, and government officials.
  • Developed and executed comprehensive business strategies to increase the company's market share and drive revenue growth.
  • Led and managed cross-functional teams, including marketing, sales, and operations.

prompts.prompt_1:
Act as an HR expert and resume writer with a specialization in creating ATS-friendly resumes. Your task is to detail the work experience for a resume. For each job entry, ensure you include: 1. **Company Name and Location**: Provide the name of the company and its location. 2. **Job Title**: Clearly state your job title. 3. **Dates of Employment**: Include the start and end dates of your employment. 4. **Responsibilities and Achievements**: Describe your key responsibilities and notable achievements, emphasizing measurable results and specific contributions. - **My information:** [ExperienceDetails(position='Engineering Manager', company='Newton & Noble', employment_period='01/2024 - Present', location='Port Harcourt', industry='Software Development', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Oversee multiple development teams totaling 12 engineers, fostering a culture of innovation and continuous improvement across the organization'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Develop and implement company-wide technical strategies aligned with long-term business objectives, resulting in a 30% increase in overall product delivery speed'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Collaborate with C-level executives and product managers to define strategic product roadmaps and prioritize features based on market demands and company vision'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Implement and refine agile methodologies across teams, improving overall engineering efficiency by 25% and enhancing cross-team collaboration'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Establish and oversee mentorship programs and career development paths for engineers at all levels, resulting in improved retention and team satisfaction'}, {'responsibility_6': 'Manage resource allocation across projects and departments, optimizing team performance and project outcomes'}], skills_acquired=['Strategic Planning', 'Team Leadership', 'Agile Methodologies', 'Resource Management', 'Mentorship Program Development']), ExperienceDetails(position='Team Lead, Fullstack Development', company='Finway', employment_period='03/2023 - 12/2023', location='Munich', industry='Software Development', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Lead architectural decisions for enterprise-level, scalable software solutions, ensuring maintainability and performance across all projects'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Conducted regular performance evaluations and provided constructive feedback'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Recruited, interviewed, and hired new team members'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Facilitated clear and effective communication within the team to ensure alignment and collaboration'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Implemented and maintained agile methodologies, facilitating sprint planning, stand-ups, and retrospectives'}], skills_acquired=['Architectural Design', 'Performance Management', 'Agile Implementation', 'Team Communication', 'Talent Acquisition']), ExperienceDetails(position='Senior Software Engineer & Consultant', company='Foobar Agency', employment_period='06/2020 - 02/2023', location='Munich', industry='Software Consultancy', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Led the development of critical features for major commercial projects'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Drove product development by incorporating innovative ideas and prioritizing features to align with business goals'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Engaged with stakeholders to understand their requirements and translated them into technical specifications'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Mentored junior developers and encouraged best practices for accessible and maintainable code'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Employed advanced techniques including code splitting, lazy loading, and other optimization methods to enhance performance'}], skills_acquired=['Feature Development', 'Product Strategy', 'Stakeholder Management', 'Code Optimization', 'Technical Mentorship']), ExperienceDetails(position='Senior Fullstack Developer', company='Mosaic City Technologies', employment_period='02/2018 - 06/2020', location='Calabar', industry='Technology', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Took the lead in building several commercial and company projects from the ground up with a user-centered development process'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Involved in architectural design discussions for applications developed by other engineers'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Consulted with team members to determine system loads and develop improvement plans'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Encouraged and facilitated ongoing learning and development within the team'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Supported junior members and delivered training as required to boost team productivity'}], skills_acquired=['Project Leadership', 'Architectural Design', 'Performance Optimization', 'Team Development', 'Technical Training']), ExperienceDetails(position='Country Manager', company='Coscico Technologies', employment_period='10/2016 - 01/2018', location='Lagos', industry='Technology', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Established and maintained strong relationships with key stakeholders, including clients, partners, and government officials'}, {'responsibility_2': "Developed and executed comprehensive business strategies to increase the company's market share and drive revenue growth"}, {'responsibility_3': 'Led and managed cross-functional teams, including marketing, sales, and operations'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Implemented budgeting, forecasting, and financial planning in tandem with yearly goals'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Recruited, hired, and trained key staff members'}], skills_acquired=['Stakeholder Management', 'Business Strategy', 'Cross-functional Leadership', 'Financial Planning', 'Talent Management'])] - **Template to Use** ```

Work Experience

[Company Name] — [Location]
[Your Job Title] [Start Date] – [End Date]
  • [Describe your responsibilities and achievements in this role]
  • [Describe any key projects or technologies you worked with]
  • [Mention any notable accomplishments or results]
[Company Name] — [Location]
[Your Job Title] [Start Date] – [End Date]
  • [Describe your responsibilities and achievements in this role]
  • [Describe any key projects or technologies you worked with]
  • [Mention any notable accomplishments or results]

[Your Job Title] [Start Date] – [End Date]
  • [Describe your responsibilities and achievements in this role]
  • [Describe any key projects or technologies you worked with]
  • [Mention any notable accomplishments or results]
``` The results should be provided in html format, Provide only the html code for the resume, without any explanations or additional text and also without ```html ```

replies:
Work Experience

Newton & Noble — Port Harcourt
Engineering Manager 01/2024 – Present
  • Oversee multiple development teams totaling 12 engineers, fostering a culture of innovation and continuous improvement across the organization.
  • Develop and implement company-wide technical strategies aligned with long-term business objectives, resulting in a 30% increase in overall product delivery speed.
  • Collaborate with C-level executives and product managers to define strategic product roadmaps and prioritize features based on market demands and company vision.
Finway — Munich
Team Lead, Fullstack Development 03/2023 – 12/2023
  • Lead architectural decisions for enterprise-level, scalable software solutions, ensuring maintainability and performance across all projects.
  • Conducted regular performance evaluations and provided constructive feedback to team members.
  • Implemented and maintained agile methodologies, facilitating sprint planning, stand-ups, and retrospectives.
Foobar Agency — Munich
Senior Software Engineer & Consultant 06/2020 – 02/2023
  • Led the development of critical features for major commercial projects, driving product development by incorporating innovative ideas.
  • Engaged with stakeholders to understand their requirements and translated them into technical specifications.
  • Mentored junior developers and encouraged best practices for accessible and maintainable code.
Mosaic City Technologies — Calabar
Senior Fullstack Developer 02/2018 – 06/2020
  • Took the lead in building several commercial and company projects from the ground up with a user-centered development process.
  • Consulted with team members to determine system loads and develop improvement plans.
  • Supported junior members and delivered training as required to boost team productivity.
Coscico Technologies — Lagos
Country Manager 10/2016 – 01/2018
  • Established and maintained strong relationships with key stakeholders, including clients, partners, and government officials.
  • Developed and executed comprehensive business strategies to increase the company's market share and drive revenue growth.
  • Led and managed cross-functional teams, including marketing, sales, and operations.

For each project, ensure you include: 1. **Project Name and Link**: Provide the name of the project and include a link to the GitHub repository or project page. 2. **Project Details**: Describe any notable recognition or achievements related to the project, such as GitHub stars or community feedback. 3. **Technical Contributions**: Highlight your specific contributions and the technologies used in the project. - **My information:** [Project(name='E-commerce Platform Overhaul', description='Led a team in redesigning and optimizing an aspect of a major e-commerce platform, resulting in a 40% increase in conversion rates and 25% reduction in page load times', link=Url('https://github.com/porta-unternehmensgruppe/storefront')), Project(name='Microservices Architecture Implementation', description='Spearheaded the transition from a monolithic to a microservices architecture, improving system scalability and reducing deployment times by 70%', link=Url('https://github.com/samodum/kaycraft-microservices'))] - **Template to Use** ```

Side Projects

[Project Name]
  • [Describe any notable recognition or reception]
  • [Describe any notable recognition or reception]
[Project Name]
  • [Describe any notable recognition or reception]
  • [Describe any notable recognition or reception]
[Project Name]
  • [Describe any notable recognition or reception]
  • [Describe any notable recognition or reception]
``` The results should be provided in html format, Provide only the html code for the resume, without any explanations or additional text and also without ```html ```

replies:
Side Projects

E-commerce Platform Overhaul
  • Achieved a 40% increase in conversion rates and a 25% reduction in page load times.
  • Recognized by the community for enhancing user experience and performance optimization.
Microservices Architecture Implementation
  • Improved system scalability and reduced deployment times by 70%.
  • Received positive feedback from peers for innovative architectural solutions.

prompts.prompt_1:

  • [Award or Recognition or Scholarship or Honor]: [Describe]
``` The results should be provided in **html** format, Provide only the html code for the resume, without any explanations or additional text and also without ```html ```

  • Conference Speaker: Keynote speaker at DSNAI+ 2020, presenting on 'Scaling Python Applications in the Cloud.'

prompts.prompt_1:
Act as an HR expert and resume writer with a specialization in creating ATS-friendly resumes. Your task is to detail the work experience for a resume. For each job entry, ensure you include: 1. **Company Name and Location**: Provide the name of the company and its location. 2. **Job Title**: Clearly state your job title. 3. **Dates of Employment**: Include the start and end dates of your employment. 4. **Responsibilities and Achievements**: Describe your key responsibilities and notable achievements, emphasizing measurable results and specific contributions. - **My information:** [ExperienceDetails(position='Engineering Manager', company='Newton & Noble', employment_period='01/2024 - Present', location='Port Harcourt', industry='Software Development', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Oversee multiple development teams totaling 12 engineers, fostering a culture of innovation and continuous improvement across the organization'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Develop and implement company-wide technical strategies aligned with long-term business objectives, resulting in a 30% increase in overall product delivery speed'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Collaborate with C-level executives and product managers to define strategic product roadmaps and prioritize features based on market demands and company vision'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Implement and refine agile methodologies across teams, improving overall engineering efficiency by 25% and enhancing cross-team collaboration'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Establish and oversee mentorship programs and career development paths for engineers at all levels, resulting in improved retention and team satisfaction'}, {'responsibility_6': 'Manage resource allocation across projects and departments, optimizing team performance and project outcomes'}], skills_acquired=['Strategic Planning', 'Team Leadership', 'Agile Methodologies', 'Resource Management', 'Mentorship Program Development']), ExperienceDetails(position='Team Lead, Fullstack Development', company='Finway', employment_period='03/2023 - 12/2023', location='Munich', industry='Software Development', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Lead architectural decisions for enterprise-level, scalable software solutions, ensuring maintainability and performance across all projects'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Conducted regular performance evaluations and provided constructive feedback'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Recruited, interviewed, and hired new team members'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Facilitated clear and effective communication within the team to ensure alignment and collaboration'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Implemented and maintained agile methodologies, facilitating sprint planning, stand-ups, and retrospectives'}], skills_acquired=['Architectural Design', 'Performance Management', 'Agile Implementation', 'Team Communication', 'Talent Acquisition']), ExperienceDetails(position='Senior Software Engineer & Consultant', company='Foobar Agency', employment_period='06/2020 - 02/2023', location='Munich', industry='Software Consultancy', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Led the development of critical features for major commercial projects'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Drove product development by incorporating innovative ideas and prioritizing features to align with business goals'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Engaged with stakeholders to understand their requirements and translated them into technical specifications'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Mentored junior developers and encouraged best practices for accessible and maintainable code'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Employed advanced techniques including code splitting, lazy loading, and other optimization methods to enhance performance'}], skills_acquired=['Feature Development', 'Product Strategy', 'Stakeholder Management', 'Code Optimization', 'Technical Mentorship']), ExperienceDetails(position='Senior Fullstack Developer', company='Mosaic City Technologies', employment_period='02/2018 - 06/2020', location='Calabar', industry='Technology', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Took the lead in building several commercial and company projects from the ground up with a user-centered development process'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Involved in architectural design discussions for applications developed by other engineers'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Consulted with team members to determine system loads and develop improvement plans'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Encouraged and facilitated ongoing learning and development within the team'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Supported junior members and delivered training as required to boost team productivity'}], skills_acquired=['Project Leadership', 'Architectural Design', 'Performance Optimization', 'Team Development', 'Technical Training']), ExperienceDetails(position='Country Manager', company='Coscico Technologies', employment_period='10/2016 - 01/2018', location='Lagos', industry='Technology', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Established and maintained strong relationships with key stakeholders, including clients, partners, and government officials'}, {'responsibility_2': "Developed and executed comprehensive business strategies to increase the company's market share and drive revenue growth"}, {'responsibility_3': 'Led and managed cross-functional teams, including marketing, sales, and operations'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Implemented budgeting, forecasting, and financial planning in tandem with yearly goals'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Recruited, hired, and trained key staff members'}], skills_acquired=['Stakeholder Management', 'Business Strategy', 'Cross-functional Leadership', 'Financial Planning', 'Talent Management'])] - **Template to Use** ```

Work Experience

[Company Name] — [Location]
[Your Job Title] [Start Date] – [End Date]
  • [Describe your responsibilities and achievements in this role]
  • [Describe any key projects or technologies you worked with]
  • [Mention any notable accomplishments or results]
[Company Name] — [Location]
[Your Job Title] [Start Date] – [End Date]
  • [Describe your responsibilities and achievements in this role]
  • [Describe any key projects or technologies you worked with]
  • [Mention any notable accomplishments or results]
[Company Name] — [Location]
[Your Job Title] [Start Date] – [End Date]
  • [Describe your responsibilities and achievements in this role]
  • [Describe any key projects or technologies you worked with]
  • [Mention any notable accomplishments or results]
``` The results should be provided in html format, Provide only the html code for the resume, without any explanations or additional text and also without ```html ```

replies:
Work Experience

Newton & Noble — Port Harcourt
Engineering Manager 01/2024 – Present
  • Oversee multiple development teams totaling 12 engineers, fostering a culture of innovation and continuous improvement across the organization.
  • Develop and implement company-wide technical strategies aligned with long-term business objectives, resulting in a 30% increase in overall product delivery speed.
  • Collaborate with C-level executives and product managers to define strategic product roadmaps and prioritize features based on market demands and company vision.
Finway — Munich
Team Lead, Fullstack Development 03/2023 – 12/2023
  • Lead architectural decisions for enterprise-level, scalable software solutions, ensuring maintainability and performance across all projects.
  • Conducted regular performance evaluations and provided constructive feedback to team members.
  • Implemented and maintained agile methodologies, facilitating sprint planning, stand-ups, and retrospectives.
Foobar Agency — Munich
Senior Software Engineer & Consultant 06/2020 – 02/2023
  • Led the development of critical features for major commercial projects, driving product development by incorporating innovative ideas.
  • Engaged with stakeholders to understand their requirements and translated them into technical specifications.
  • Mentored junior developers and encouraged best practices for accessible and maintainable code.
Mosaic City Technologies — Calabar
Senior Fullstack Developer 02/2018 – 06/2020
  • Took the lead in building several commercial and company projects from the ground up with a user-centered development process.
  • Consulted with team members to determine system loads and develop improvement plans.
  • Supported junior members and delivered training as required to boost team productivity.
Coscico Technologies — Lagos
Country Manager 10/2016 – 01/2018
  • Established and maintained strong relationships with key stakeholders, including clients, partners, and government officials.
  • Developed and executed comprehensive business strategies to increase the company's market share and drive revenue growth.
  • Led and managed cross-functional teams, including marketing, sales, and operations.

Newton & Noble — Port Harcourt
Engineering Manager 01/2024 – Present
  • Oversee multiple development teams totaling 12 engineers, fostering a culture of innovation and continuous improvement across the organization.
  • Develop and implement company-wide technical strategies aligned with long-term business objectives, resulting in a 30% increase in overall product delivery speed.
  • Collaborate with C-level executives and product managers to define strategic product roadmaps and prioritize features based on market demands and company vision.
Finway — Munich
Team Lead, Fullstack Development 03/2023 – 12/2023
  • Lead architectural decisions for enterprise-level, scalable software solutions, ensuring maintainability and performance across all projects.
  • Conducted regular performance evaluations and provided constructive feedback to team members.

Foobar Agency — Munich
Senior Software Engineer & Consultant 06/2020 – 02/2023
  • Led the development of critical features for major commercial projects, driving product development by incorporating innovative ideas.
  • Engaged with stakeholders to understand their requirements and translated them into technical specifications.
  • Employed advanced techniques including code splitting and lazy loading to enhance performance.
Mosaic City Technologies — Calabar
Senior Fullstack Developer 02/2018 – 06/2020
  • Took the lead in building several commercial and company projects from the ground up with a user-centered development process.
  • Consulted with team members to determine system loads and develop improvement plans.
  • Supported junior members and delivered training as required to boost team productivity.
Coscico Technologies — Lagos
Country Manager 10/2016 – 01/2018
  • Established and maintained strong relationships with key stakeholders, including clients, partners, and government officials.
  • Developed and executed comprehensive business strategies to increase the company's market share and drive revenue growth.
  • Led and managed cross-functional teams, including marketing, sales, and operations.

prompts.prompt_1:
Act as an HR expert and resume writer with a specialization in creating ATS-friendly resumes. Your task is to articulate the educational background for a resume. For each educational entry, ensure you include: 1. **Institution Name and Location**: Specify the university or educational institution’s name and location. 2. **Degree and Field of Study**: Clearly indicate the degree earned and the field of study. 3. **GPA**: Include your GPA if it is strong and relevant. 4. **Relevant Coursework**: List key courses with their grades to showcase your academic strengths. - **My information:** [{'degree': "Bachelor's Degree", 'university': 'Abia State University', 'gpa': '4.48/5', 'graduation_year': 2007, 'field_of_study': 'Microbiology'}, {'degree': 'Diploma', 'university': 'Alison', 'gpa': '86/100', 'graduation_year': 2013, 'field_of_study': 'Operations Management'}, {'degree': 'Diploma', 'university': 'Central Bank of Nigeria South-South Entrepreneurship Development Centre', 'gpa': '92/100', 'graduation_year': 2014, 'field_of_study': 'Entrepreneurship & Business Management'}] - **Template to Use** ```

Education

[University Name] [Location]
[Degree] in [Field of Study] | GPA: [Your GPA]/4.0 [Start Year] – [End Year]
  • [Course Name] → GPA: [Grade]/4.0
  • [Course Name] → GPA: [Grade]/4.0
  • [Course Name] → GPA: [Grade]/4.0
  • [Course Name] → GPA: [Grade]/4.0
  • [Course Name] → GPA: [Grade]/4.0
``` The results should be provided in html format, Provide only the html code for the resume, without any explanations or additional text and also without ```html ```

prompts.prompt_1:
Act as an HR expert and resume writer with a specialization in creating ATS-friendly resumes. Your task is to detail the work experience for a resume. For each job entry, ensure you include: 1. **Company Name and Location**: Provide the name of the company and its location. 2. **Job Title**: Clearly state your job title. 3. **Dates of Employment**: Include the start and end dates of your employment. 4. **Responsibilities and Achievements**: Describe your key responsibilities and notable achievements, emphasizing measurable results and specific contributions. - **My information:** [ExperienceDetails(position='Engineering Manager', company='Newton & Noble', employment_period='01/2024 - Present', location='Port Harcourt', industry='Software Development', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Oversee multiple development teams totaling 12 engineers, fostering a culture of innovation and continuous improvement across the organization'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Develop and implement company-wide technical strategies aligned with long-term business objectives, resulting in a 30% increase in overall product delivery speed'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Collaborate with C-level executives and product managers to define strategic product roadmaps and prioritize features based on market demands and company vision'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Implement and refine agile methodologies across teams, improving overall engineering efficiency by 25% and enhancing cross-team collaboration'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Establish and oversee mentorship programs and career development paths for engineers at all levels, resulting in improved retention and team satisfaction'}, {'responsibility_6': 'Manage resource allocation across projects and departments, optimizing team performance and project outcomes'}], skills_acquired=['Strategic Planning', 'Team Leadership', 'Agile Methodologies', 'Resource Management', 'Mentorship Program Development']), ExperienceDetails(position='Team Lead, Fullstack Development', company='Finway', employment_period='03/2023 - 12/2023', location='Munich', industry='Software Development', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Lead architectural decisions for enterprise-level, scalable software solutions, ensuring maintainability and performance across all projects'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Conducted regular performance evaluations and provided constructive feedback'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Recruited, interviewed, and hired new team members'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Facilitated clear and effective communication within the team to ensure alignment and collaboration'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Implemented and maintained agile methodologies, facilitating sprint planning, stand-ups, and retrospectives'}], skills_acquired=['Architectural Design', 'Performance Management', 'Agile Implementation', 'Team Communication', 'Talent Acquisition']), ExperienceDetails(position='Senior Software Engineer & Consultant', company='Foobar Agency', employment_period='06/2020 - 02/2023', location='Munich', industry='Software Consultancy', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Led the development of critical features for major commercial projects'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Drove product development by incorporating innovative ideas and prioritizing features to align with business goals'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Engaged with stakeholders to understand their requirements and translated them into technical specifications'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Mentored junior developers and encouraged best practices for accessible and maintainable code'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Employed advanced techniques including code splitting, lazy loading, and other optimization methods to enhance performance'}], skills_acquired=['Feature Development', 'Product Strategy', 'Stakeholder Management', 'Code Optimization', 'Technical Mentorship']), ExperienceDetails(position='Senior Fullstack Developer', company='Mosaic City Technologies', employment_period='02/2018 - 06/2020', location='Calabar', industry='Technology', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Took the lead in building several commercial and company projects from the ground up with a user-centered development process'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Involved in architectural design discussions for applications developed by other engineers'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Consulted with team members to determine system loads and develop improvement plans'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Encouraged and facilitated ongoing learning and development within the team'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Supported junior members and delivered training as required to boost team productivity'}], skills_acquired=['Project Leadership', 'Architectural Design', 'Performance Optimization', 'Team Development', 'Technical Training']), ExperienceDetails(position='Country Manager', company='Coscico Technologies', employment_period='10/2016 - 01/2018', location='Lagos', industry='Technology', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Established and maintained strong relationships with key stakeholders, including clients, partners, and government officials'}, {'responsibility_2': "Developed and executed comprehensive business strategies to increase the company's market share and drive revenue growth"}, {'responsibility_3': 'Led and managed cross-functional teams, including marketing, sales, and operations'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Implemented budgeting, forecasting, and financial planning in tandem with yearly goals'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Recruited, hired, and trained key staff members'}], skills_acquired=['Stakeholder Management', 'Business Strategy', 'Cross-functional Leadership', 'Financial Planning', 'Talent Management'])] - **Template to Use** ```

Work Experience

[Company Name] — [Location]
[Your Job Title] [Start Date] – [End Date]
  • [Describe your responsibilities and achievements in this role]
  • [Describe any key projects or technologies you worked with]
  • [Mention any notable accomplishments or results]
[Company Name] — [Location]
[Your Job Title] [Start Date] – [End Date]
  • [Describe your responsibilities and achievements in this role]
  • [Describe any key projects or technologies you worked with]
  • [Mention any notable accomplishments or results]
[Company Name] — [Location]
[Your Job Title] [Start Date] – [End Date]
  • [Describe your responsibilities and achievements in this role]
  • [Describe any key projects or technologies you worked with]
  • [Mention any notable accomplishments or results]
``` The results should be provided in html format, Provide only the html code for the resume, without any explanations or additional text and also without ```html ```

replies:
Work Experience

Newton & Noble — Port Harcourt
Engineering Manager 01/2024 – Present
  • Oversee multiple development teams totaling 12 engineers, fostering a culture of innovation and continuous improvement across the organization.
  • Develop and implement company-wide technical strategies aligned with long-term business objectives, resulting in a 30% increase in overall product delivery speed.
  • Collaborate with C-level executives and product managers to define strategic product roadmaps and prioritize features based on market demands and company vision.
Finway — Munich
Team Lead, Fullstack Development 03/2023 – 12/2023
  • Lead architectural decisions for enterprise-level, scalable software solutions, ensuring maintainability and performance across all projects.
  • Conducted regular performance evaluations and provided constructive feedback to team members.
  • Implemented and maintained agile methodologies, facilitating sprint planning, stand-ups, and retrospectives.
Foobar Agency — Munich
Senior Software Engineer & Consultant 06/2020 – 02/2023
  • Led the development of critical features for major commercial projects, driving product development by incorporating innovative ideas.
  • Engaged with stakeholders to understand their requirements and translated them into technical specifications.
  • Mentored junior developers and encouraged best practices for accessible and maintainable code.
Mosaic City Technologies — Calabar
Senior Fullstack Developer 02/2018 – 06/2020
  • Took the lead in building several commercial and company projects from the ground up with a user-centered development process.
  • Consulted with team members to determine system loads and develop improvement plans.
  • Supported junior members and delivered training as required to boost team productivity.
Coscico Technologies — Lagos
Country Manager 10/2016 – 01/2018
  • Established and maintained strong relationships with key stakeholders, including clients, partners, and government officials.
  • Developed and executed comprehensive business strategies to increase the company's market share and drive revenue growth.
  • Led and managed cross-functional teams, including marketing, sales, and operations.

**My information:** [ExperienceDetails(position='Engineering Manager', company='Newton & Noble', employment_period='01/2024 - Present', location='Port Harcourt', industry='Software Development', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Oversee multiple development teams totaling 12 engineers, fostering a culture of innovation and continuous improvement across the organization'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Develop and implement company-wide technical strategies aligned with long-term business objectives, resulting in a 30% increase in overall product delivery speed'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Collaborate with C-level executives and product managers to define strategic product roadmaps and prioritize features based on market demands and company vision'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Implement and refine agile methodologies across teams, improving overall engineering efficiency by 25% and enhancing cross-team collaboration'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Establish and oversee mentorship programs and career development paths for engineers at all levels, resulting in improved retention and team satisfaction'}, {'responsibility_6': 'Manage resource allocation across projects and departments, optimizing team performance and project outcomes'}], skills_acquired=['Strategic Planning', 'Team Leadership', 'Agile Methodologies', 'Resource Management', 'Mentorship Program Development']), ExperienceDetails(position='Team Lead, Fullstack Development', company='Finway', employment_period='03/2023 - 12/2023', location='Munich', industry='Software Development', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Lead architectural decisions for enterprise-level, scalable software solutions, ensuring maintainability and performance across all projects'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Conducted regular performance evaluations and provided constructive feedback'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Recruited, interviewed, and hired new team members'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Facilitated clear and effective communication within the team to ensure alignment and collaboration'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Implemented and maintained agile methodologies, facilitating sprint planning, stand-ups, and retrospectives'}], skills_acquired=['Architectural Design', 'Performance Management', 'Agile Implementation', 'Team Communication', 'Talent Acquisition']), ExperienceDetails(position='Senior Software Engineer & Consultant', company='Foobar Agency', employment_period='06/2020 - 02/2023', location='Munich', industry='Software Consultancy', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Led the development of critical features for major commercial projects'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Drove product development by incorporating innovative ideas and prioritizing features to align with business goals'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Engaged with stakeholders to understand their requirements and translated them into technical specifications'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Mentored junior developers and encouraged best practices for accessible and maintainable code'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Employed advanced techniques including code splitting, lazy loading, and other optimization methods to enhance performance'}], skills_acquired=['Feature Development', 'Product Strategy', 'Stakeholder Management', 'Code Optimization', 'Technical Mentorship']), ExperienceDetails(position='Senior Fullstack Developer', company='Mosaic City Technologies', employment_period='02/2018 - 06/2020', location='Calabar', industry='Technology', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Took the lead in building several commercial and company projects from the ground up with a user-centered development process'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Involved in architectural design discussions for applications developed by other engineers'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Consulted with team members to determine system loads and develop improvement plans'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Encouraged and facilitated ongoing learning and development within the team'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Supported junior members and delivered training as required to boost team productivity'}], skills_acquired=['Project Leadership', 'Architectural Design', 'Performance Optimization', 'Team Development', 'Technical Training']), ExperienceDetails(position='Country Manager', company='Coscico Technologies', employment_period='10/2016 - 01/2018', location='Lagos', industry='Technology', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Established and maintained strong relationships with key stakeholders, including clients, partners, and government officials'}, {'responsibility_2': "Developed and executed comprehensive business strategies to increase the company's market share and drive revenue growth"}, {'responsibility_3': 'Led and managed cross-functional teams, including marketing, sales, and operations'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Implemented budgeting, forecasting, and financial planning in tandem with yearly goals'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Recruited, hired, and trained key staff members'}], skills_acquired=['Stakeholder Management', 'Business Strategy', 'Cross-functional Leadership', 'Financial Planning', 'Talent Management'])] - **Template to Use** ```

replies:
Work Experience

Newton & Noble — Port Harcourt
Engineering Manager 01/2024 – Present
  • Oversee multiple development teams totaling 12 engineers, fostering a culture of innovation and continuous improvement across the organization.
  • Develop and implement company-wide technical strategies aligned with long-term business objectives, resulting in a 30% increase in overall product delivery speed.
  • Collaborate with C-level executives and product managers to define strategic product roadmaps and prioritize features based on market demands and company vision.
Finway — Munich
Team Lead, Fullstack Development 03/2023 – 12/2023
  • Lead architectural decisions for enterprise-level, scalable software solutions, ensuring maintainability and performance across all projects.
  • Conducted regular performance evaluations and provided constructive feedback to team members.
  • Implemented and maintained agile methodologies, facilitating sprint planning, stand-ups, and retrospectives.
Foobar Agency — Munich
Senior Software Engineer & Consultant 06/2020 – 02/2023
  • Led the development of critical features for major commercial projects, driving product development by incorporating innovative ideas.
  • Engaged with stakeholders to understand their requirements and translated them into technical specifications.
  • Employed advanced techniques including code splitting and lazy loading to enhance performance.
Mosaic City Technologies — Calabar
Senior Fullstack Developer 02/2018 – 06/2020
  • Took the lead in building several commercial and company projects from the ground up with a user-centered development process.
  • Consulted with team members to determine system loads and develop improvement plans.
  • Supported junior members and delivered training as required to boost team productivity.
Coscico Technologies — Lagos
Country Manager 10/2016 – 01/2018
  • Established and maintained strong relationships with key stakeholders, including clients, partners, and government officials.
  • Developed and executed comprehensive business strategies to increase the company's market share and drive revenue growth.
  • Implemented budgeting, forecasting, and financial planning in tandem with yearly goals.

For each job entry, ensure you include: 1. **Company Name and Location**: Provide the name of the company and its location. 2. **Job Title**: Clearly state your job title. 3. **Dates of Employment**: Include the start and end dates of your employment. 4. **Responsibilities and Achievements**: Describe your key responsibilities and notable achievements, emphasizing measurable results and specific contributions. - **My information:** [ExperienceDetails(position='Engineering Manager', company='Newton & Noble', employment_period='01/2024 - Present', location='Port Harcourt', industry='Software Development', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Oversee multiple development teams totaling 12 engineers, fostering a culture of innovation and continuous improvement across the organization'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Develop and implement company-wide technical strategies aligned with long-term business objectives, resulting in a 30% increase in overall product delivery speed'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Collaborate with C-level executives and product managers to define strategic product roadmaps and prioritize features based on market demands and company vision'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Implement and refine agile methodologies across teams, improving overall engineering efficiency by 25% and enhancing cross-team collaboration'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Establish and oversee mentorship programs and career development paths for engineers at all levels, resulting in improved retention and team satisfaction'}, {'responsibility_6': 'Manage resource allocation across projects and departments, optimizing team performance and project outcomes'}], skills_acquired=['Strategic Planning', 'Team Leadership', 'Agile Methodologies', 'Resource Management', 'Mentorship Program Development']), ExperienceDetails(position='Team Lead, Fullstack Development', company='Finway', employment_period='03/2023 - 12/2023', location='Munich', industry='Software Development', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Lead architectural decisions for enterprise-level, scalable software solutions, ensuring maintainability and performance across all projects'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Conducted regular performance evaluations and provided constructive feedback'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Recruited, interviewed, and hired new team members'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Facilitated clear and effective communication within the team to ensure alignment and collaboration'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Implemented and maintained agile methodologies, facilitating sprint planning, stand-ups, and retrospectives'}], skills_acquired=['Architectural Design', 'Performance Management', 'Agile Implementation', 'Team Communication', 'Talent Acquisition']), ExperienceDetails(position='Senior Software Engineer & Consultant', company='Foobar Agency', employment_period='06/2020 - 02/2023', location='Munich', industry='Software Consultancy', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Led the development of critical features for major commercial projects'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Drove product development by incorporating innovative ideas and prioritizing features to align with business goals'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Engaged with stakeholders to understand their requirements and translated them into technical specifications'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Mentored junior developers and encouraged best practices for accessible and maintainable code'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Employed advanced techniques including code splitting, lazy loading, and other optimization methods to enhance performance'}], skills_acquired=['Feature Development', 'Product Strategy', 'Stakeholder Management', 'Code Optimization', 'Technical Mentorship']), ExperienceDetails(position='Senior Fullstack Developer', company='Mosaic City Technologies', employment_period='02/2018 - 06/2020', location='Calabar', industry='Technology', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Took the lead in building several commercial and company projects from the ground up with a user-centered development process'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Involved in architectural design discussions for applications developed by other engineers'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Consulted with team members to determine system loads and develop improvement plans'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Encouraged and facilitated ongoing learning and development within the team'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Supported junior members and delivered training as required to boost team productivity'}], skills_acquired=['Project Leadership', 'Architectural Design', 'Performance Optimization', 'Team Development', 'Technical Training']), ExperienceDetails(position='Country Manager', company='Coscico Technologies', employment_period='10/2016 - 01/2018', location='Lagos', industry='Technology', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Established and maintained strong relationships with key stakeholders, including clients, partners, and government officials'}, {'responsibility_2': "Developed and executed comprehensive business strategies to increase the company's market share and drive revenue growth"}, {'responsibility_3': 'Led and managed cross-functional teams, including marketing, sales, and operations'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Implemented budgeting, forecasting, and financial planning in tandem with yearly goals'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Recruited, hired, and trained key staff members'}], skills_acquired=['Stakeholder Management', 'Business Strategy', 'Cross-functional Leadership', 'Financial Planning', 'Talent Management'])] - **Template to Use** ```

Work Experience

[Company Name] — [Location]
[Your Job Title] [Start Date] – [End Date]
  • [Describe your responsibilities and achievements in this role]
  • [Describe any key projects or technologies you worked with]
  • [Mention any notable accomplishments or results]
[Company Name] — [Location]
[Your Job Title] [Start Date] – [End Date]
  • [Describe your responsibilities and achievements in this role]
  • [Describe any key projects or technologies you worked with]
  • [Mention any notable accomplishments or results]
[Company Name] — [Location]
[Your Job Title] [Start Date] – [End Date]
  • [Describe your responsibilities and achievements in this role]
  • [Describe any key projects or technologies you worked with]
  • [Mention any notable accomplishments or results]
``` The results should be provided in html format, Provide only the html code for the resume, without any explanations or additional text and also without ```html ```

replies:
Work Experience

Newton & Noble — Port Harcourt
Engineering Manager 01/2024 – Present
  • Oversee multiple development teams totaling 12 engineers, fostering a culture of innovation and continuous improvement across the organization.
  • Develop and implement company-wide technical strategies aligned with long-term business objectives, resulting in a 30% increase in overall product delivery speed.
  • Collaborate with C-level executives and product managers to define strategic product roadmaps and prioritize features based on market demands and company vision.
Finway — Munich
Team Lead, Fullstack Development 03/2023 – 12/2023
  • Lead architectural decisions for enterprise-level, scalable software solutions, ensuring maintainability and performance across all projects.
  • Conducted regular performance evaluations and provided constructive feedback to team members.
  • Implemented and maintained agile methodologies, facilitating sprint planning, stand-ups, and retrospectives.
Foobar Agency — Munich
Senior Software Engineer & Consultant 06/2020 – 02/2023
  • Led the development of critical features for major commercial projects, driving product development by incorporating innovative ideas.
  • Engaged with stakeholders to understand their requirements and translated them into technical specifications.
  • Mentored junior developers and encouraged best practices for accessible and maintainable code.
Mosaic City Technologies — Calabar
Senior Fullstack Developer 02/2018 – 06/2020
  • Took the lead in building several commercial and company projects from the ground up with a user-centered development process.
  • Consulted with team members to determine system loads and develop improvement plans.
  • Supported junior members and delivered training as required to boost team productivity.
Coscico Technologies — Lagos
Country Manager 10/2016 – 01/2018
  • Established and maintained strong relationships with key stakeholders, including clients, partners, and government officials.
  • Developed and executed comprehensive business strategies to increase the company's market share and drive revenue growth.
  • Led and managed cross-functional teams, including marketing, sales, and operations.

For each technology, ensure you include: 1. **Technology Category**: Clearly state the category or type of technology. 2. **Specific Technologies**: List the specific technologies or tools within each category. - **My information:** front_end=['JavaScript', 'TypeScript', 'React', 'NextJS', 'HTML5', 'CSS3', 'Tailwind'] back_end=['NodeJS', 'Python', 'Microservices', 'NestJS', 'REST', 'GraphQL'] data_storage=['PostgreSQL', 'MongoDB', 'Redis'] cloud_devops=['AWS', 'GCP', 'Docker', 'Kubernetes', 'CI/CD'] project_management=['Agile', 'Scrum', 'Kanban', 'Jira'] design=['Figma', 'Adobe XD', 'Adobe Photoshop', 'Adobe Illustrator', 'Blender'] - **Template to Use** ```

Technologies

  • [Technology Category][Specific Technologies]
``` The results should be provided in html format, include only the provide information and Provide only the html code for the resume, without any explanations or additional text and also without ```html ```

replies:
Technologies

  • Front-EndJavaScript, TypeScript, React, NextJS, HTML5, CSS3, Tailwind
  • Back-EndNodeJS, Python, Microservices, NestJS, REST, GraphQL
  • Data StoragePostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis
  • Cloud & DevOpsAWS, GCP, Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD
  • Project ManagementAgile, Scrum, Kanban, Jira
  • DesignFigma, Adobe XD, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Blender
