prompts.prompt_1:
Act as an HR expert and resume writer with a specialization in creating ATS-friendly resumes. Your task is to detail the work experience for a resume. For each job entry, ensure you include: 1. **Company Name and Location**: Provide the name of the company and its location. 2. **Job Title**: Clearly state your job title. 3. **Dates of Employment**: Include the start and end dates of your employment. 4. **Responsibilities and Achievements**: Describe your key responsibilities and notable achievements, emphasizing measurable results and specific contributions. - **My information:** [ExperienceDetails(position='Engineering Manager', company='Newton & Noble', employment_period='01/2024 - Present', location='Port Harcourt', industry='Software Development', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Oversee multiple development teams totaling 12 engineers, fostering a culture of innovation and continuous improvement across the organization'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Develop and implement company-wide technical strategies aligned with long-term business objectives, resulting in a 30% increase in overall product delivery speed'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Collaborate with C-level executives and product managers to define strategic product roadmaps and prioritize features based on market demands and company vision'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Implement and refine agile methodologies across teams, improving overall engineering efficiency by 25% and enhancing cross-team collaboration'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Establish and oversee mentorship programs and career development paths for engineers at all levels, resulting in improved retention and team satisfaction'}, {'responsibility_6': 'Manage resource allocation across projects and departments, optimizing team performance and project outcomes'}], skills_acquired=['Strategic Planning', 'Team Leadership', 'Agile Methodologies', 'Resource Management', 'Mentorship Program Development']), ExperienceDetails(position='Team Lead, Fullstack Development', company='Finway', employment_period='03/2023 - 12/2023', location='Munich', industry='Software Development', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Lead architectural decisions for enterprise-level, scalable software solutions, ensuring maintainability and performance across all projects'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Conducted regular performance evaluations and provided constructive feedback'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Recruited, interviewed, and hired new team members'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Facilitated clear and effective communication within the team to ensure alignment and collaboration'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Implemented and maintained agile methodologies, facilitating sprint planning, stand-ups, and retrospectives'}], skills_acquired=['Architectural Design', 'Performance Management', 'Agile Implementation', 'Team Communication', 'Talent Acquisition']), ExperienceDetails(position='Senior Software Engineer & Consultant', company='Foobar Agency', employment_period='06/2020 - 02/2023', location='Munich', industry='Software Consultancy', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Led the development of critical features for major commercial projects'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Drove product development by incorporating innovative ideas and prioritizing features to align with business goals'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Engaged with stakeholders to understand their requirements and translated them into technical specifications'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Mentored junior developers and encouraged best practices for accessible and maintainable code'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Employed advanced techniques including code splitting, lazy loading, and other optimization methods to enhance performance'}], skills_acquired=['Feature Development', 'Product Strategy', 'Stakeholder Management', 'Code Optimization', 'Technical Mentorship']), ExperienceDetails(position='Senior Fullstack Developer', company='Mosaic City Technologies', employment_period='02/2018 - 06/2020', location='Calabar', industry='Technology', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Took the lead in building several commercial and company projects from the ground up with a user-centered development process'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Involved in architectural design discussions for applications developed by other engineers'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Consulted with team members to determine system loads and develop improvement plans'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Encouraged and facilitated ongoing learning and development within the team'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Supported junior members and delivered training as required to boost team productivity'}], skills_acquired=['Project Leadership', 'Architectural Design', 'Performance Optimization', 'Team Development', 'Technical Training']), ExperienceDetails(position='Country Manager', company='Coscico Technologies', employment_period='10/2016 - 01/2018', location='Lagos', industry='Technology', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Established and maintained strong relationships with key stakeholders, including clients, partners, and government officials'}, {'responsibility_2': "Developed and executed comprehensive business strategies to increase the company's market share and drive revenue growth"}, {'responsibility_3': 'Led and managed cross-functional teams, including marketing, sales, and operations'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Implemented budgeting, forecasting, and financial planning in tandem with yearly goals'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Recruited, hired, and trained key staff members'}], skills_acquired=['Stakeholder Management', 'Business Strategy', 'Cross-functional Leadership', 'Financial Planning', 'Talent Management'])] - **Template to Use** ```

Work Experience

[Company Name] — [Location]
[Your Job Title] [Start Date] – [End Date]
  • [Describe your responsibilities and achievements in this role]
  • [Describe any key projects or technologies you worked with]
  • [Mention any notable accomplishments or results]
[Company Name] — [Location]
[Your Job Title] [Start Date] – [End Date]
  • [Describe your responsibilities and achievements in this role]
  • [Describe any key projects or technologies you worked with]
  • [Mention any notable accomplishments or results]
[Company Name] — [Location]
[Your Job Title] [Start Date] – [End Date]
  • [Describe your responsibilities and achievements in this role]
  • [Describe any key projects or technologies you worked with]
  • [Mention any notable accomplishments or results]
``` The results should be provided in html format, Provide only the html code for the resume, without any explanations or additional text and also without ```html ```

replies:
Work Experience

Newton & Noble — Port Harcourt
Engineering Manager 01/2024 – Present
  • Oversee multiple development teams totaling 12 engineers, fostering a culture of innovation and continuous improvement across the organization.
  • Develop and implement company-wide technical strategies aligned with long-term business objectives, resulting in a 30% increase in overall product delivery speed.
  • Collaborate with C-level executives and product managers to define strategic product roadmaps and prioritize features based on market demands and company vision.
Finway — Munich
Team Lead, Fullstack Development 03/2023 – 12/2023
  • Lead architectural decisions for enterprise-level, scalable software solutions, ensuring maintainability and performance across all projects.
  • Conducted regular performance evaluations and provided constructive feedback to team members.
  • Implemented and maintained agile methodologies, facilitating sprint planning, stand-ups, and retrospectives.
Foobar Agency — Munich
Senior Software Engineer & Consultant 06/2020 – 02/2023
  • Led the development of critical features for major commercial projects, driving product development by incorporating innovative ideas.
  • Engaged with stakeholders to understand their requirements and translated them into technical specifications.
  • Employed advanced techniques including code splitting and lazy loading to enhance performance.
Mosaic City Technologies — Calabar
Senior Fullstack Developer 02/2018 – 06/2020
  • Took the lead in building several commercial and company projects from the ground up with a user-centered development process.
  • Consulted with team members to determine system loads and develop improvement plans.
  • Supported junior members and delivered training as required to boost team productivity.
Coscico Technologies — Lagos
Country Manager 10/2016 – 01/2018
  • Established and maintained strong relationships with key stakeholders, including clients, partners, and government officials.
  • Developed and executed comprehensive business strategies to increase the company's market share and drive revenue growth.
  • Led and managed cross-functional teams, including marketing, sales, and operations.

prompts.prompt_1:
Act as an HR expert and resume writer with a specialization in creating ATS-friendly resumes. Your task is to highlight notable side projects. For each project, ensure you include: 1. **Project Name and Link**: Provide the name of the project and include a link to the GitHub repository or project page. 2. **Project Details**: Describe any notable recognition or achievements related to the project, such as GitHub stars or community feedback. 3. **Technical Contributions**: Highlight your specific contributions and the technologies used in the project. - **My information:** [Project(name='E-commerce Platform Overhaul', description='Led a team in redesigning and optimizing an aspect of a major e-commerce platform, resulting in a 40% increase in conversion rates and 25% reduction in page load times', link=Url('https://github.com/porta-unternehmensgruppe/storefront')), Project(name='Microservices Architecture Implementation', description='Spearheaded the transition from a monolithic to a microservices architecture, improving system scalability and reducing deployment times by 70%', link=Url('https://github.com/samodum/kaycraft-microservices'))] - **Template to Use** ```

  • [Describe any notable recognition or reception]

  • [Describe any notable recognition or reception]
  • [Describe any notable recognition or reception]

replies:

  • Gained positive feedback from developers for simplifying the deployment process.

For each achievement, ensure you include: 1. **Award or Recognition**: Clearly state the name of the award, recognition, scholarship, or honor. 2. **Description**: Provide a brief description of the achievement and its relevance to your career or academic journey. - **My information:** [Achievement(name='Tech Innovation Award', description="Received the 'Tech Innovator of the Year' award from the Nigerian Tech Association for pioneering AI implementation in local businesses"), Achievement(name='Conference Speaker', description="Keynote speaker at DSNAI+ 2020, presenting on 'Scaling Python Applications in the Cloud'")] [Achievement(name='Tech Innovation Award', description="Received the 'Tech Innovator of the Year' award from the Nigerian Tech Association for pioneering AI implementation in local businesses"), Achievement(name='Conference Speaker', description="Keynote speaker at DSNAI+ 2020, presenting on 'Scaling Python Applications in the Cloud'")] - **Template to Use** ```

Achievements

  • [Award or Recognition or Scholarship or Honor]: [Describe]
  • [Award or Recognition or Scholarship or Honor]: [Describe]
  • [Award or Recognition or Scholarship or Honor]: [Describe]
``` The results should be provided in **html** format, Provide only the html code for the resume, without any explanations or additional text and also without ```html ```

replies:
Achievements

  • Tech Innovation Award: Received the 'Tech Innovator of the Year' award from the Nigerian Tech Association for pioneering AI implementation in local businesses.
  • Conference Speaker: Keynote speaker at DSNAI+ 2020, presenting on 'Scaling Python Applications in the Cloud.'

prompts.prompt_1:
Act as an HR expert and resume writer with a specialization in creating ATS-friendly resumes. Your task is to create a professional and polished bio for the resume. The bio should: 1. **Professional Summary**: Provide a concise summary of your professional journey, highlighting key achievements and skills. 2. **Career Focus**: Clearly state your career goals and the specific role you are seeking. - **My information:** Results-driven Engineering Manager with a proven track record in leading high-performing teams and delivering scalable web solutions. Expertise in full-stack development, with a focus on JavaScript, TypeScript, React, and NodeJS. Skilled in architecting robust systems that serve millions of users and driving technical innovation aligned with business goals. - **Template to Use** ```

[Your Bio]

``` The results should be provided in html format, include only the provide information and Provide only the html code for the resume, without any explanations or additional text and also without ```html ```

replies: Results-driven Engineering Manager with a proven track record in leading high-performing teams and delivering scalable web solutions. Expertise in full-stack development, with a focus on JavaScript, TypeScript, React, and NodeJS. Skilled in architecting robust systems that serve millions of users and driving technical innovation aligned with business goals. Seeking a leadership role where I can leverage my technical expertise and team management skills to drive project success and foster a culture of innovation.

prompts.prompt_1:
Act as an HR expert and resume writer with a specialization in creating ATS-friendly resumes. Your task is to detail the work experience for a resume. For each job entry, ensure you include: 1. **Company Name and Location**: Provide the name of the company and its location. 2. **Job Title**: Clearly state your job title. 3. **Dates of Employment**: Include the start and end dates of your employment. 4. **Responsibilities and Achievements**: Describe your key responsibilities and notable achievements, emphasizing measurable results and specific contributions. - **My information:** [ExperienceDetails(position='Engineering Manager', company='Newton & Noble', employment_period='01/2024 - Present', location='Port Harcourt', industry='Software Development', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Oversee multiple development teams totaling 12 engineers, fostering a culture of innovation and continuous improvement across the organization'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Develop and implement company-wide technical strategies aligned with long-term business objectives, resulting in a 30% increase in overall product delivery speed'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Collaborate with C-level executives and product managers to define strategic product roadmaps and prioritize features based on market demands and company vision'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Implement and refine agile methodologies across teams, improving overall engineering efficiency by 25% and enhancing cross-team collaboration'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Establish and oversee mentorship programs and career development paths for engineers at all levels, resulting in improved retention and team satisfaction'}, {'responsibility_6': 'Manage resource allocation across projects and departments, optimizing team performance and project outcomes'}], skills_acquired=['Strategic Planning', 'Team Leadership', 'Agile Methodologies', 'Resource Management', 'Mentorship Program Development']), ExperienceDetails(position='Team Lead, Fullstack Development', company='Finway', employment_period='03/2023 - 12/2023', location='Munich', industry='Software Development', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Lead architectural decisions for enterprise-level, scalable software solutions, ensuring maintainability and performance across all projects'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Conducted regular performance evaluations and provided constructive feedback'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Recruited, interviewed, and hired new team members'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Facilitated clear and effective communication within the team to ensure alignment and collaboration'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Implemented and maintained agile methodologies, facilitating sprint planning, stand-ups, and retrospectives'}], skills_acquired=['Architectural Design', 'Performance Management', 'Agile Implementation', 'Team Communication', 'Talent Acquisition']), ExperienceDetails(position='Senior Software Engineer & Consultant', company='Foobar Agency', employment_period='06/2020 - 02/2023', location='Munich', industry='Software Consultancy', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Led the development of critical features for major commercial projects'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Drove product development by incorporating innovative ideas and prioritizing features to align with business goals'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Engaged with stakeholders to understand their requirements and translated them into technical specifications'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Mentored junior developers and encouraged best practices for accessible and maintainable code'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Employed advanced techniques including code splitting, lazy loading, and other optimization methods to enhance performance'}], skills_acquired=['Feature Development', 'Product Strategy', 'Stakeholder Management', 'Code Optimization', 'Technical Mentorship']), ExperienceDetails(position='Senior Fullstack Developer', company='Mosaic City Technologies', employment_period='02/2018 - 06/2020', location='Calabar', industry='Technology', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Took the lead in building several commercial and company projects from the ground up with a user-centered development process'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Involved in architectural design discussions for applications developed by other engineers'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Consulted with team members to determine system loads and develop improvement plans'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Encouraged and facilitated ongoing learning and development within the team'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Supported junior members and delivered training as required to boost team productivity'}], skills_acquired=['Project Leadership', 'Architectural Design', 'Performance Optimization', 'Team Development', 'Technical Training']), ExperienceDetails(position='Country Manager', company='Coscico Technologies', employment_period='10/2016 - 01/2018', location='Lagos', industry='Technology', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Established and maintained strong relationships with key stakeholders, including clients, partners, and government officials'}, {'responsibility_2': "Developed and executed comprehensive business strategies to increase the company's market share and drive revenue growth"}, {'responsibility_3': 'Led and managed cross-functional teams, including marketing, sales, and operations'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Implemented budgeting, forecasting, and financial planning in tandem with yearly goals'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Recruited, hired, and trained key staff members'}], skills_acquired=['Stakeholder Management', 'Business Strategy', 'Cross-functional Leadership', 'Financial Planning', 'Talent Management'])] - **Template to Use** ```

Work Experience

[Company Name] — [Location]
[Your Job Title] [Start Date] – [End Date]
  • [Describe your responsibilities and achievements in this role]
  • [Describe any key projects or technologies you worked with]
  • [Mention any notable accomplishments or results]
[Company Name] — [Location]
[Your Job Title] [Start Date] – [End Date]
  • [Describe your responsibilities and achievements in this role]
  • [Describe any key projects or technologies you worked with]
  • [Mention any notable accomplishments or results]
[Company Name] — [Location]
[Your Job Title] [Start Date] – [End Date]
  • [Describe your responsibilities and achievements in this role]
  • [Describe any key projects or technologies you worked with]
  • [Mention any notable accomplishments or results]
``` The results should be provided in html format, Provide only the html code for the resume, without any explanations or additional text and also without ```html ```

replies:
Work Experience

Newton & Noble — Port Harcourt
Engineering Manager 01/2024 – Present
  • Oversee multiple development teams totaling 12 engineers, fostering a culture of innovation and continuous improvement across the organization.
  • Develop and implement company-wide technical strategies aligned with long-term business objectives, resulting in a 30% increase in overall product delivery speed.
  • Collaborate with C-level executives and product managers to define strategic product roadmaps and prioritize features based on market demands and company vision.
Finway — Munich
Team Lead, Fullstack Development 03/2023 – 12/2023
  • Lead architectural decisions for enterprise-level, scalable software solutions, ensuring maintainability and performance across all projects.
  • Conducted regular performance evaluations and provided constructive feedback to team members.
  • Implemented and maintained agile methodologies, facilitating sprint planning, stand-ups, and retrospectives.
Foobar Agency — Munich
Senior Software Engineer & Consultant 06/2020 – 02/2023
  • Led the development of critical features for major commercial projects, driving product development by incorporating innovative ideas.
  • Engaged with stakeholders to understand their requirements and translated them into technical specifications.
  • Mentored junior developers and encouraged best practices for accessible and maintainable code.
Mosaic City Technologies — Calabar
Senior Fullstack Developer 02/2018 – 06/2020
  • Took the lead in building several commercial and company projects from the ground up with a user-centered development process.
  • Involved in architectural design discussions for applications developed by other engineers.
  • Supported junior members and delivered training as required to boost team productivity.
Coscico Technologies — Lagos
Country Manager 10/2016 – 01/2018
  • Established and maintained strong relationships with key stakeholders, including clients, partners, and government officials.
  • Developed and executed comprehensive business strategies to increase the company's market share and drive revenue growth.
  • Led and managed cross-functional teams, including marketing, sales, and operations.

replies:
Work Experience

  • 01/2024 - Present

    Engineering Manager Newton & Noble — Port Harcourt
    • Oversee multiple development teams totaling 12 engineers, fostering a culture of innovation and continuous improvement across the organization.
    • Develop and implement company-wide technical strategies aligned with long-term business objectives, resulting in a 30% increase in overall product delivery speed.
    • Collaborate with C-level executives and product managers to define strategic product roadmaps and prioritize features based on market demands and company vision.
    • Implement and refine agile methodologies across teams, improving overall engineering efficiency by 25% and enhancing cross-team collaboration.
    • Establish and oversee mentorship programs and career development paths for engineers at all levels, resulting in improved retention and team satisfaction.
    • Manage resource allocation across projects and departments, optimizing team performance and project outcomes.

  • 03/2023 - 12/2023

    Team Lead, Fullstack Development Finway — Munich
    • Lead architectural decisions for enterprise-level, scalable software solutions, ensuring maintainability and performance across all projects.
    • Conducted regular performance evaluations and provided constructive feedback to team members.
    • Recruited, interviewed, and hired new team members to strengthen the development team.
    • Facilitated clear and effective communication within the team to ensure alignment and collaboration.
    • Implemented and maintained agile methodologies, facilitating sprint planning, stand-ups, and retrospectives.

  • 06/2020 - 02/2023

    Senior Software Engineer & Consultant Foobar Agency — Munich
    • Led the development of critical features for major commercial projects, driving product success.
    • Drove product development by incorporating innovative ideas and prioritizing features to align with business goals.
    • Engaged with stakeholders to understand their requirements and translated them into technical specifications.
    • Mentored junior developers and encouraged best practices for accessible and maintainable code.
    • Employed advanced techniques including code splitting, lazy loading, and other optimization methods to enhance performance.

  • 02/2018 - 06/2020

    Senior Fullstack Developer Mosaic City Technologies — Calabar
    • Took the lead in building several commercial and company projects from the ground up with a user-centered development process.
    • Involved in architectural design discussions for applications developed by other engineers.
    • Consulted with team members to determine system loads and develop improvement plans.
    • Encouraged and facilitated ongoing learning and development within the team.
    • Supported junior members and delivered training as required to boost team productivity.

  • 10/2016 - 01/2018

    Country Manager Coscico Technologies — Lagos
    • Established and maintained strong relationships with key stakeholders, including clients, partners, and government officials.
    • Developed and executed comprehensive business strategies to increase the company's market share and drive revenue growth.
    • Led and managed cross-functional teams, including marketing, sales, and operations.
    • Implemented budgeting, forecasting, and financial planning in tandem with yearly goals.
    • Recruited, hired, and trained key staff members to build a strong team.

For each educational entry, ensure you include: 1. **Institution Name and Location**: Specify the university or educational institution’s name and location. 2. **Degree and Field of Study**: Clearly indicate the degree earned and the field of study. - **My information:** [EducationDetails(degree="Bachelor's Degree", university='Abia State University', gpa='4.48/5', graduation_year=2007, field_of_study='Microbiology'), EducationDetails(degree='Diploma', university='Alison', gpa='86/100', graduation_year=2013, field_of_study='Operations Management'), EducationDetails(degree='Diploma', university='Central Bank of Nigeria South-South Entrepreneurship Development Centre', gpa='92/100', graduation_year=2014, field_of_study='Entrepreneurship & Business Management')] - **Template to Use** ```

Education

  • [Start Year] - [End Year]

    [Degree] in [Field of Study] | GPA: [Your GPA] [University Name] — [Location]
``` The results should be provided in html format, Provide only the html code for the resume, without any explanations or additional text and also without ```html ```

replies:
Education

  • 2003 - 2007

    Bachelor's Degree in Microbiology | GPA: 4.48/5 Abia State University — Nigeria

  • 2013

    Diploma in Operations Management | GPA: 86/100 Alison — Online

  • 2014

    Diploma in Entrepreneurship & Business Management | GPA: 92/100 Central Bank of Nigeria South-South Entrepreneurship Development Centre — Nigeria

prompts.prompt_1:
Act as an HR expert and resume writer with a specialization in creating ATS-friendly resumes. Your task is to detail the work experience for a resume. For each job entry, ensure you include: 1. **Company Name and Location**: Provide the name of the company and its location. 2. **Job Title**: Clearly state your job title. 3. **Dates of Employment**: Include the start and end dates of your employment. 4. **Responsibilities and Achievements**: Describe your key responsibilities and notable achievements, emphasizing measurable results and specific contributions. - **My information:** [ExperienceDetails(position='Engineering Manager', company='Newton & Noble', employment_period='01/2024 - Present', location='Port Harcourt', industry='Software Development', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Oversee multiple development teams totaling 12 engineers, fostering a culture of innovation and continuous improvement across the organization'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Develop and implement company-wide technical strategies aligned with long-term business objectives, resulting in a 30% increase in overall product delivery speed'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Collaborate with C-level executives and product managers to define strategic product roadmaps and prioritize features based on market demands and company vision'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Implement and refine agile methodologies across teams, improving overall engineering efficiency by 25% and enhancing cross-team collaboration'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Establish and oversee mentorship programs and career development paths for engineers at all levels, resulting in improved retention and team satisfaction'}, {'responsibility_6': 'Manage resource allocation across projects and departments, optimizing team performance and project outcomes'}], skills_acquired=['Strategic Planning', 'Team Leadership', 'Agile Methodologies', 'Resource Management', 'Mentorship Program Development']), ExperienceDetails(position='Team Lead, Fullstack Development', company='Finway', employment_period='03/2023 - 12/2023', location='Munich', industry='Software Development', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Led architectural decisions for enterprise-level, scalable software solutions, ensuring maintainability and performance across all projects'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Conducted regular performance evaluations and provided constructive feedback'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Recruited, interviewed, and hired new team members'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Facilitated clear and effective communication within the team to ensure alignment and collaboration'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Implemented and maintained agile methodologies, facilitating sprint planning, stand-ups, and retrospectives'}], skills_acquired=['Architectural Design', 'Performance Management', 'Agile Implementation', 'Team Communication', 'Talent Acquisition']), ExperienceDetails(position='Senior Software Engineer & Consultant', company='Foobar Agency', employment_period='06/2020 - 02/2023', location='Munich', industry='Software Consultancy', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Led the development of critical features for major commercial projects'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Drove product development by incorporating innovative ideas and prioritizing features to align with business goals'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Engaged with stakeholders to understand their requirements and translated them into technical specifications'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Mentored junior developers and encouraged best practices for accessible and maintainable code'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Employed advanced techniques including code splitting, lazy loading, and other optimization methods to enhance performance'}], skills_acquired=['Feature Development', 'Product Strategy', 'Stakeholder Management', 'Code Optimization', 'Technical Mentorship']), ExperienceDetails(position='Senior Fullstack Developer', company='Mosaic City Technologies', employment_period='02/2018 - 06/2020', location='Calabar', industry='Technology', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Took the lead in building several commercial and company projects from the ground up with a user-centered development process'}, {'responsibility_2': 'Involved in architectural design discussions for applications developed by other engineers'}, {'responsibility_3': 'Consulted with team members to determine system loads and develop improvement plans'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Encouraged and facilitated ongoing learning and development within the team'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Supported junior members and delivered training as required to boost team productivity'}], skills_acquired=['Project Leadership', 'Architectural Design', 'Performance Optimization', 'Team Development', 'Technical Training']), ExperienceDetails(position='Country Manager', company='Coscico Technologies', employment_period='10/2016 - 01/2018', location='Lagos', industry='Technology', key_responsibilities=[{'responsibility_1': 'Established and maintained strong relationships with key stakeholders, including clients, partners, and government officials'}, {'responsibility_2': "Developed and executed comprehensive business strategies to increase the company's market share and drive revenue growth"}, {'responsibility_3': 'Led and managed cross-functional teams, including marketing, sales, and operations'}, {'responsibility_4': 'Implemented budgeting, forecasting, and financial planning in tandem with yearly goals'}, {'responsibility_5': 'Recruited, hired, and trained key staff members'}], skills_acquired=['Stakeholder Management', 'Business Strategy', 'Cross-functional Leadership', 'Financial Planning', 'Talent Management'])] - **Template to Use** ```

Work Experience

  • [Start Date] - [End Date]

    [Your Job Title] [Company Name] — [Location]
    • [Describe your responsibilities and achievements in this role]
``` The results should be provided in html format, Provide only the html code for the resume, without any explanations or additional text and also without ```html ```

replies:
Work Experience

  • 01/2024 - Present

    Engineering Manager Newton & Noble — Port Harcourt
    • Oversee multiple development teams totaling 12 engineers, fostering a culture of innovation and continuous improvement across the organization.
    • Develop and implement company-wide technical strategies aligned with long-term business objectives, resulting in a 30% increase in overall product delivery speed.
    • Collaborate with C-level executives and product managers to define strategic product roadmaps and prioritize features based on market demands and company vision.
    • Implement and refine agile methodologies across teams, improving overall engineering efficiency by 25% and enhancing cross-team collaboration.
    • Establish and oversee mentorship programs and career development paths for engineers at all levels, resulting in improved retention and team satisfaction.
    • Manage resource allocation across projects and departments, optimizing team performance and project outcomes.

  • 03/2023 - 12/2023

    Team Lead, Fullstack Development Finway — Munich
    • Led architectural decisions for enterprise-level, scalable software solutions, ensuring maintainability and performance across all projects.
    • Conducted regular performance evaluations and provided constructive feedback to team members.
    • Recruited, interviewed, and hired new team members to strengthen the development team.
    • Facilitated clear and effective communication within the team to ensure alignment and collaboration.
    • Implemented and maintained agile methodologies, facilitating sprint planning, stand-ups, and retrospectives.

  • 06/2020 - 02/2023

    Senior Software Engineer & Consultant Foobar Agency — Munich
    • Led the development of critical features for major commercial projects, driving product success.
    • Drove product development by incorporating innovative ideas and prioritizing features to align with business goals.
    • Engaged with stakeholders to understand their requirements and translated them into technical specifications.
    • Mentored junior developers and encouraged best practices for accessible and maintainable code.
    • Employed advanced techniques including code splitting, lazy loading, and other optimization methods to enhance performance.

  • 02/2018 - 06/2020

    Senior Fullstack Developer Mosaic City Technologies — Calabar
    • Took the lead in building several commercial and company projects from the ground up with a user-centered development process.
    • Involved in architectural design discussions for applications developed by other engineers.
    • Consulted with team members to determine system loads and develop improvement plans.
    • Encouraged and facilitated ongoing learning and development within the team.
    • Supported junior members and delivered training as required to boost team productivity.

  • 10/2016 - 01/2018

    Country Manager Coscico Technologies — Lagos
    • Established and maintained strong relationships with key stakeholders, including clients, partners, and government officials.
    • Developed and executed comprehensive business strategies to increase the company's market share and drive revenue growth.
    • Led and managed cross-functional teams, including marketing, sales, and operations.
    • Implemented budgeting, forecasting, and financial planning in tandem with yearly goals.
    • Recruited, hired, and trained key staff members to build a strong team.

prompts.prompt_1:
Act as an HR expert and resume writer with a specialization in creating ATS-friendly resumes. Your task is to list additional skills relevant or not to the job. For each skill, ensure you include: 1. **Skill Category**: Clearly state the category or type of skill. 2. **Specific Skills**: List the specific skills or technologies within each category. 3. **Language Proficiency and Experience**: Include language proficiency levels. - **My information:** languages=[Language(language='English', proficiency='Native'), Language(language='ASL', proficiency='Professional'), Language(language='German', proficiency='Conversational'), Language(language='French', proficiency='Basic')] miscellaneous=['3D modeling', 'Cinematography', 'Filmmaking', 'Tailoring', 'Cooking', 'Photography', 'Sales', 'Marketing', 'Public Speaking', 'Negotiation'] - **Template to Use** ```

Other Skills

  • [Category]

    [Specific skill or Language]

``` The results should be provided in html format, Provide only the html code for the resume, without any explanations or additional text and also without ```html ```

replies:

  • Creative Skills

    3D modeling, Cinematography, Filmmaking, Photography

  • Culinary Skills

    Cooking

  • Business Skills

    Sales, Marketing, Negotiation

  • Communication Skills

    Public Speaking

  • Technical Skills

    Tailoring
